tabs.title: Myself.
tabs.description: Hello, I am Hamid. Full-time programmer and interested in up-to-date and complex topics of software engineering, I have been working and learning as a full-time programmer for more than 5 years. I started programming with the great C++ language and have been specializing in the web for over 4 years. I am very interested in working in new fields. From site design and programmer to server management and config topics and its advanced issues.

tabs.title: Education.
tabs.description:
STATE UNIVERSITY, State College, Pa. Bachelor of Arts in Advertising; Minor: Spanish; GPA: 3.35, anticipated in May 2014

Notable Accomplishments:
  • Dean's List: Fall 2011, Spring 2018
  • Awarded Best Advertising Campaign Proposal for Health Committee, State University, Spring 2013

items.title: Melodyo
items.subtitle: Instrumental Music App
items.description: Melodyo instrumental music application, in which I was in charge of programming Back and Front, as well as dubbing the project.

items.title: Alibaba
items.subtitle: Alibaba Travels Co.
items.description: Front developer in domestic and international flight and assistance in the development of Alibaba's new website.

items.title: PaaSta
items.subtitle: PaaSta Cloud Platform
items.description:
Pasta started its activity in the ArvanCloud programming competition, and with the efforts of team members, we produced products that facilitate the use of PaaS services. This product helps you convert your resources into applications and deploy your applications on PaaS servers without the use of learning tools such as Docker and Kubernetes.
Pasta won second place in the ArvanCloud cloud game competition and also second place in the Elcamp Stars 2021 event.

items.title: Basalam
items.subtitle: Social Marketplace
items.description: Basalam FrontEnd team advises on rewriting the code and transferring it to Nuxt.js.

items.title: Raimun
items.subtitle: Computer Software
items.description:
Raimun is a software holding company and has software in various technical fields such as RaiLive, RaiHost, RaiQ, RaiArt.
I first worked as a front end programmer and eventually as a front end team manager.

items.title: TarHan
items.subtitle: Online Graphic Platform
items.description: A massive project to build a design and printing platform.

items.title: OpenGate

items.title: CafiMafi
items.subtitle: Online Coffee and accessories shop
items.description: CafiMafi is an online store that sells essential coffee and coffee items. The complete programming of the front end of this project and part of the back end of this project was done by me.

items.title: PiroArch
items.subtitle: Auto Desk Inventor Add-ons
items.description: An in-depth development project developed by the Inventor engineering software to create plugins to increase the speed of manufacturing and manufacturing of industrial components. This project is due to the fact that in Iran and even in the world people are a bit fluent in this technology and can completely personalize software engineering and take activities that may take normal time-consuming time in one Click to implement.
